message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have the smaller share this time, I'll take the bigger one!
I'll give you a slightly larger share this time, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal...
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. Time to make a serious offer
I'm making one last attempt to make a fair deal. Let's meet in the middle!
